'''0.0.22a_02'''<ref name="up now">[https://archive.org/download/Minecraft_IRC_Logs_2009/DBN-IRC-Logs/ IRC logs], #minecraft.20090629.log: "''P5:19:16 < 08Notch > _03 is up now''" [...] "''P5:19:48 < 08Notch > er, I mean 02''". (June 29, 2009, 17:19 UTC&minus;5; 22:19 UTC)</ref> is a version of [[Java Edition Classic]] released on June 29, 2009, at 22:19 UTC to try to fix sounds still being choppy.<ref name="up now"/>

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Attempted to fix sounds still being choppy; this fix worked for some,<ref>[https://archive.org/download/Minecraft_IRC_Logs_2009/DBN-IRC-Logs/ IRC logs], #minecraft.20090629.log: "''P5:22:27 <Testvan> _02 music is smooth''". (June 29, 2009, 17:22:27 UTC&minus;5; 22:22:27 UTC)</ref><ref>[https://archive.org/download/Minecraft_IRC_Logs_2009/DBN-IRC-Logs/ IRC logs], #minecraft.20090629.log: "''P5:23:54 <tesseract> SOUND IS FIXED FOR ME. NO MORE GAPS.''". (June 29, 2009, 17:23:54 UTC&minus;5; 22:23:54 UTC)</ref> but some sounds remained choppy.<ref>[https://archive.org/download/Minecraft_IRC_Logs_2009/DBN-IRC-Logs/ IRC logs], #minecraft.20090629.log: "''P5:30:20 <08Notch> CHOPPY, sure. That's a bug''", "''P5:30:23 <vdgmprgrmr> They sound like someone crumpling paper.''" (June 29, 2009, 17:30:20 UTC&minus;5; 22:30:20 UTC)</ref>
